category: Competition Player Registration Regulations/Article 6 (Status of Competition Player)
contents: Article 6 (Status of Competitors) ① Competitors can engage in activities such as participation in competitions hosted and managed by the Sports Council and member sports organizations, such as national sports competitions and event-specific competitions. Details regarding this are in the participation guidelines for each competition. It depends. ② Competitors may participate in the following activities provided by the Sports Association. 1. Life sports program 2. Project to support activities of sports clubs and sports clubs 3. Project to support workplace sports departments and school sports departments 4. Project to promote professional sports, such as nurturing excellent athletes 5. Project to link professional sports with daily sports 6. Athletes Various projects such as welfare 7. Various other projects provided by the Sports Association, etc.
